job_tasks.phrase: Improve Time to Market for AI/ML models, Enable a platform for Standardization & Compliance. Enable Infrastructure for Auditability by Design, Platforming for Scale & Optimization.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the strategic goals of the ML platform, focusing on business outcomes like improved time-to-market and compliance.

job_tasks.phrase: fulfill business needs.
job_tasks.justification: Directly states the objective of meeting business requirements.

job_tasks.phrase: contribute to the team's internal metrics and the product metrics. You would be part of defining how and what we measure to define success from an engineering perspective.
job_tasks.justification: Indicates a focus on measuring and achieving success aligned with product and business objectives.

job_tasks.phrase: feature store
job_tasks.justification: A feature store is a key component in the data pipeline for machine learning.

job_tasks.phrase: Design, Develop, and maintain large scale data and cloud infrastructure required for machine learning projects.
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly covers the design, development, and maintenance of data infrastructure.

job_tasks.phrase: Machine Learning
job_tasks.justification: A general term indicating the core activity of building and working with ML models.

job_tasks.phrase: model training, model deployments, model observability, versioning, explain ability
job_tasks.justification: Lists several key aspects of the machine learning model lifecycle.

job_tasks.phrase: Understanding of Large Language Models.
job_tasks.justification: Directly mentions the need to understand and work with LLMs, a core aspect of modeling in GenAI.

job_tasks.phrase: Leverage your expertise in working with GCP and Vertex AI as a foundation for scaling AI and ML solutions.
job_tasks.justification: Vertex AI is a platform for building and deploying ML models, and this phrase implies working with its modeling capabilities.

job_tasks.phrase: building a new Machine Learning Platform
job_tasks.justification: Describes the fundamental task of creating a software platform.

job_tasks.phrase: Building software that meets the team's & company's engineering standards.
job_tasks.justification: Focuses on the creation of software with adherence to standards.

job_tasks.phrase: Contribute to all aspects of the platform lifecycle, with a focus on engineering (including new product ideas).
job_tasks.justification: Encompasses the development and engineering of a platform.

job_tasks.phrase: Lead and promote good software engineering practices within an agile/iterative development approach
job_tasks.justification: Highlights the importance of software engineering principles and practices.

job_tasks.phrase: Define solution architecture and contribute to the landscape architecture.
job_tasks.justification: Deals with the design of software systems and their architecture.

job_tasks.phrase: Explore and apply new technologies suitable for our product.
job_tasks.justification: Involves the practical application of technology within a product development context.

job_tasks.phrase: Take responsibility for the product, all the way from ideation to runtime
job_tasks.justification: Covers the full lifecycle of software product development.

job_tasks.phrase: Continuously nurture skills towards areas such as system architecture, infrastructure management, software development and platform engineering.
job_tasks.justification: Directly mentions software development as a skill area to be developed.

job_tasks.phrase: Develop tools, frameworks and custom components to address common needs in machine learning platforms
job_tasks.justification: Focuses on the creation of software tools and components for a specific platform.

job_tasks.phrase: Utilize software engineering to create efficient, scalable solutions for deployment in critical production environments
job_tasks.justification: Emphasizes the use of software engineering for creating and deploying solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: DevOps
job_tasks.justification: This is a direct mention of DevOps, which is closely related to MLOps in the context of managing ML systems.

job_tasks.phrase: model deployments, model observability, versioning
job_tasks.justification: These are core MLOps activities related to managing models in production.

job_tasks.phrase: Define, maintain, and improve our integration and delivery pipeline.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the CI/CD pipeline, a key aspect of MLOps.

job_tasks.phrase: Working with CI/CD flow where we strive for total automation of bringing code from a developer to production.
job_tasks.justification: Explicitly mentions CI/CD and automation for code deployment, which are MLOps principles.

job_tasks.phrase: infrastructure management
job_tasks.justification: Infrastructure management is a key component of MLOps.

soft_skills.phrase: Partner closely with engineering manager. Onboard, coach and mentor engineers in order to secure transfer of competence and a high performing team. Design and educate other engineers in ways of working, encouraging good practices
In a true cross functional team with designers, data analysts, engineers, agile coach, and product owner we make this a reality.
ever evolving landscape with the advent of Generative AI.
Explore and apply new technologies suitable for our product.
Continuously nurture skills towards areas such as system architecture, infrastructure management, software development and platform engineering.
Are you excited about technology and want a chance to be part of building better digital products for our customers?
get on the ground floor of a fantastic journey
Take responsibility for the product, all the way from ideation to runtime
You will get to influence the technology landscape in the team.

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes building and deploying ML platforms, with specific mentions of 'Generative AI' and 'Large Language Models'. While it covers MLOps and software development, the explicit focus on the evolving GenAI landscape and the need to understand LLMs points towards the GenAI Engineer profile.
